commandDescription: Deletes references from csv files based on input
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for xml sources. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv objects. Default: '%s'
orgFlagDescription: Specify the alias of the org
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
modeFlagDescription: Specify the mode you want to run the command.'clean' directly deletes ghost references, 'interactive' prompt the user everytime, 'log' writes references in a file. Default: %s
logdirFlagDescription: Optionally specify a dir for log files. Default: '%s'
skipTypesFlagDescription: Skips types. eg CustomField, ApexClass, UserPermissions, CustomSettingAccesses ecc. Default: '%s'
recordtypeFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv recordTypes. Default: '%s'
